mapper.select: select li.id, li.name,li.url, li.user_link_category_id as userLinkCategoryId, li.status, li.sort_no as sortNo, lc.id as linkCategoryId, lc.name as linkCategoryName from link_info li left join user_link_category ulc on ulc.id = li.user_link_category_id left join link_category lc on lc.id = ulc.link_category_id where ulc.user_id = #{userId} order by ulc.sort_no asc, li.sort_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into link_info (name, url, user_link_category_id, status, sort_no) values (#{linkInfo.name}, #{linkInfo.url}, #{linkInfo.userLinkCategoryId}, #{linkInfo.status}, #{linkInfo.sortNo})
